com.cyc.baseclient.subl.subtypes

Class AbstractSubLMultiArgFunction<T,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.baseclient.cycobject.DefaultCycObject
      • com.cyc.baseclient.subl.subtypes.BasicSubLFunction
        • com.cyc.baseclient.subl.subtypes.AbstractSubLMultiArgFunction<T,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - evaluation argument types
    V - evaluation return type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CycObject, SubLFunction, Comparable<Object>

    public abstract class AbstractSubLMultiArgFunction<T,V>
extends BasicSubLFunction
    Extends BasicSubLFunction to provide support methods for evaluating the function with multiple arguments. This class does not provide a method for evaluating the SubL function, but there are classes which extend this one and do provide such methods.

    Because this class extends BasicSubLFunction, it provides all of the methods necessary to satisfy the SubLSourceFile interface.

        Throws:
